quotes.quote: You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Why so serious?
I can do this all day.
I'm just here for the gasoline.
An empire toppled by its enemies can rise again. But one which crumbles from within? That's dead... forever.
MJ and I, we're gonna have a hell of a time!
Tell me something, my friend. You ever dance with the devil in the pale moonlight?
No protectors here: no Lanterns, no Kryptonian. This world will fall — like all the others.
You've come to die! Your world is now my world, like all worlds!
The world is not what it ought to be. Humanity longs for the eternal for a world beyond time, because time is what enslaves us.
You're a wizard, Harry.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.quote: Don't you turn your back on me, Harry Potter! I want you to look at me when I kill you! I want to see the light leave your eyes!
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quotes.quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quotes.quote: There is no good and evil. There is only power.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.quote: It’s not much, but it’s home.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quotes.quote: Anything’s possible if you’ve got enough nerve.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quotes.quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.
quotes.movie: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

quotes.quote: It is unavoidable. It is your destiny. You - like your father - are now... mine!
quotes.movie: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

quotes.quote: May the Force be with you.
I find your lack of faith disturbing.
Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering.
I am no man!
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quotes.quote: There’s some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it’s worth fighting for.
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

quotes.quote: You shall not pass!
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: A day may come when the courage of men fails, but it is not this day!
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quotes.quote: Why do we fall, Bruce? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.
I was happy floating, staring at the stars.
Some men just want to watch the world burn.
With great power comes great responsibility.
I'm not a hero. I'm a scientist!
There was an idea... to bring together a group of remarkable people.
What were you the god of again?
Your world is one of the saddest, most pathetic excuses for existence I have ever seen.
Dread it. Run from it. Destiny arrives all the same.
I am Iron Man.
We have a Hulk.
The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn’t exist.
It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
I'm Batman.
Wakanda forever!
That's my secret, Captain. I'm always angry.
I'm a man looking for a storm.
I am Groot.
They will join you in the sun, Kal. In time, they will accomplish wonders.
A hero can be anyone, even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as putting a coat on a young boy's shoulders to let him know the world hadn't ended.
You know what they say about hope. Breeds eternal misery.
I cherish peace with all my heart. I don't care how many men, women, and children I need to kill to get it.
You ever dance with the devil in the pale moonlight?
With the whole world watching, the smartest thing for you to do would be to kill me. But if you do, well, you'll never know who was under that blanket.
We all wear masks, Spider-Man. But which one is real? The one that hides your face, or the one that is your face?
My father made the world a better place. I'm going to make it mine.
Life doesn't give us purpose. We give life purpose.
Heroes are made by the path they choose, not the powers they are graced with.
The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
If you cage the beast, the beast will get angry.
The very strength that keeps the darkness at bay.
quotes.movie: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

quotes.quote: Where we're going, we don't need roads.
After all this time? Always.
quotes.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

quotes.quote: I'm not bad. I'm just drawn that way.
I'm Mary Poppins, y'all!

quotes.movie: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

quotes.quote: I am no Jedi.

If you look at the dark side, careful you must be. For the dark side looks back.
quotes.movie: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

quotes.quote: The world is changing. Who now has the strength to stand against the armies of Isengard and Mordor?
quotes.movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.
What if this is as good as it gets?

Just because something works doesn't mean it can't be improved.
If you're nothing without the suit, then you shouldn't have it.
No amount of money ever bought a second of time.
I have been falling for thirty minutes!
You didn't see that coming?
You know what kind of plan never fails? No plan. No plan at all.

Humans. They're not the cowering wretches we were promised. They stand. They are unruly, and therefore cannot be ruled.
